name: Horde (itch)
description:
A low poly FPS where you have to survive waves of Zombies.
There's an unlimited amount of waves and with each wave the zombies spawn a little faster and in greater numbers.

Made for Ludum Dare Mini #72

Low poly terrain & models created by me

Other Assets used:
Zombie model (bitgem3d.com)
weapon sound FX (freesoundeffects.com)
Music (twinmusicom.org)

Controls
WASD : Movement
Left Mouse Button: Primary Fire
Right Mouse Button: Secondary Fire
Left Shift : Run
Space: Jump
